headline: Points North Joins the Workday Partner Program to Deliver Certified Payroll and Prevailing Wage Solutions
summary: Points North, a leading provider of certified payroll reporting and prevailing wage compliance software, today announced it has signed a partnership agreement with Workday, Inc. This partnership will streamline certified payroll reporting, rate management, wage calculations, and other payroll compliance functions for businesses, reducing manual data entry and compliance risks.

headline: Workday CEO to Present at the Goldman Sachs Communacopia & Technology Conference on September 10, 2025
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, today announced that Carl Eschenbach, CEO, Workday, will present at the Goldman Sachs Communacopia & Technology Conference on September 10, 2025 at 8:10 a.m. Pacific Time / 11:10 a.m. Eastern Time.
